nodes.bodyText: we can add this as well to EndpointRegistryConstants.java?
We can. I added it here because it is a REST API level parameter name
would this work for other sortBy fields except ID and regName?
Currently, we have not given any other sorting fields in the REST API. Once we add them, we need to update this method
